ref: 5976 tōraṇa n. ʻ arched or festooned doorway ʼ MBh., ʻ triangle supporting a large balance ʼ ŚivaP.
Pa. tōraṇa -- n. ʻ arched doorway ʼ;
Pk. tōraṇa -- n. ʻ outer door, gate ʼ;
M. torṇẽ n. ʻ that part of a waterwheel on which rests the fore -- extremity of the beam and under which the bullock moves ʼ;
